Лично мое мнение. Слишком простая и не интересная механика игры. Концепт и задумка интересные, но реализация очень поверхностная. Всю динамику игры портит ОЧЕНЬ долго е ожидание в лобби. Политика компании добавлять ДЛЦ котоыре не стоят своих денег тоже отворачивает. ДЛЦ - это всего лишь один маньяк с кучкой способностей. Оформил вовзрат средств.
Не сыграл - хуй пососал!

This game is great. Playing as a survivor is nerve-wracking and intense. You rely on your teammates, and work together. As a killer, you feel like you have a great amount of control, and it's a ton of fun to hunt down and kill the other survivors.

There's only one catch.



There are many bugs that make the game... Unplayable. I've had a lot of times where I've loaded up this game, and got stuck in the menus, waited for ten minutes, and got stuck there. I've had the same thing happen with the loading screens. Meanwhile, 15 minutes ago, I was playing fine.

There are just a lot of bugs that tend to freeze the game, and require you to restart it.

When these annoying bugs that break the game go away, I highly recommend this game, but until then, I'd say save your money, unless you don't mind restarting the game every so often.
Good.

Aktuell unspielbar aufgrund von zu vielen Bugs.

Was vor allem stört sind u.a.:

- Das matchmaking: Rang 1 killer trifft auf 1-2 rang 1 survivor und 1-2 newbies (rang 20)
- Zurücksetzen aller charaktere auf level 0 inkl. alle items perks usw.
- Beitritt in eine Lobby schlägt oft fehl und verursacht einen Loading screen, den man nicht mehr wegbekommt (neustart des spiels)
- Thema Balancing: Killer sind aktuell viel zu stark (vor allem der neueste), sodass survivor zu wenig möglichkeiten haben zu entkommen
- Camping der Killer am Haken vermindert den spielspaß unglaublich stark, teammates haben keine gelegenheit den überlebenden am Haken zu retten

what I liked about it: Watching gameplay of it
What I disliked about it: Not able to play it due to potato graphics card

This game is AMAZING gameplay wise, it has its own line of co-op where you and your team of survivors work together to escape the grasp of the killer.Yet it has some glitches as the joining game glitch where it makes it almost un playable other than that its worth the amount of money!

O jogo é bom, me surpreendi o quanto é viciante. Dá pra encontrar muitos BR, já que jogar em amigos fica muito mais divertido e estratégico. O fato de ele não ter uma versão em PT-BR pode prejudicar um pouco no começo para entender as perks e alguns itens, mas de modo geral não se baseia em textos e sim na jogabilidade. Porém não é só de flores que vive esse jogo. Já perdi as contas da quantidade de bugs, as vezes 5 pra tentar em uma partida, tendo que reiniciar o jogo. O jogo tem um preço bom mesmo no seu valor de lançamento, contudo se está pensando em pegar as DLCs, onde cada uma adiciona um novo assassino e sobrevivente ou novas roupas, saiba que vc pagará quase metade do valor do jogo por cada uma. E prepare-se para passar raiva caso escolha jogar de sobrevivente. Suas chances de sair da fase com vida são bem pequenas. Na realidade se vc é um sobrevivente novato e joga contra um assassino novato, suas chances são boas. Porém mesmo vc sendo um sobrevivente expert e jogar contra um assassino expert, a chance de vc sobreviver é pequena. Isso pq eu nem falei dos assassinos das DLCs que são absurdos de apelões. O jogo não tem equilibrio de rank, ou seja, novatos e experientes encontram-se na mesma partida, podendo frustar os novos jogadores.
Em suma, o jogo precisa ainda de alguns consertos com servidores e bugs e equilibrar a dificuldade nas partidas, dando mais recursos aos sobreviventes para sobreviver ao assassino. Fora a isso é um jogo extremamente divertido, viciante e que vale o dinheiro pago.

Bugs, las mismas mecánicas en TODAS las partidas, la ausencia de contenido (solo hay asesinos y supervivientes nuevos en DLCs de pago) y el chat postpartida con el odio entre supervivientes y asesinos debido al mal balance del juego. Cada día hay menos gente conectada. 


Debería estar todavía en Early Acces.

The game updates frequently, it's still bad optimized but it had made a lot of progress since release. Every major update comes with a bug or issue with the servers. The gameplay changes a lot every 3 months or so just after you trained your muscle memory, leading to frustration, especially after a DLC release.

[h1][b]Death is not an escape![/b][/h1]

[b][u]Release Date:[/u] Jun 14, 2016
[b][u]Latest Review Date:[/u] Dec 12, 2016


[b][i][h1]Graphics[/h1][/i][/b]
Honestly, graphics could have been better for Unreal Engine 4 game. However, product lacks performance optimization as is. It was very unstable on release, but it feels like optimization getting better and better with every patch. I am able to run DBD at 50-60 FPS (except on Haddonfield map) with max graphics on i7, GTX 980, but people with better specs were reporting performance much worse, so it is a gamble at this point. No colorblind support, and lack of in-depth options to tune graphics is somewhat of an oversight. [i]Sidenote:[/i] Shadowplay does not recognize this game for capture, but you can still technically record if you enable "Capture Dekstop" option.

[b][i][h1]Sound[/h1][/i][/b]
Sound is very important part of this game and overall developers did a great job capturing the horror and combining it with essential soundeffects. Survivors and Killers would never speak, so you will be limited to hearing grunts, screams, signs, whizzes and cries. I highly recommend a pair of good headphones, they will help you juke the killer or find and catch survivors depending on a role you play. There is no in-game voice chat option, and I doubt there will ever be one, but if you are playing with friends you can of course use Discrod or Teamspeak.

[b][i][h1]Story[/h1][/i][/b]
Unfortunately the game doesn't tell you much of the story. There are lore parts hidden around descriptions of various items, offering, and perks, but ultimately if you want to read up more on a lore of history or a character, you would have to visit the official website. Lore is interesting but very much undeveloped, lacking major details and explanations, perhaps leaving better parts out for speculation. 

[b][i][h1]Gameplay[/h1][/i][/b]
To keep it short and simple, 4 survivors versus 1 killer. Survivors must escape by powering 5 generators, killer must stop them and kill them before they do. Entity is ominous Game Master of the realm, which keeps game in check. There are limitations on both sides. Killer can not straight up kill a survivor when they are found (exceptions are Devour Hope and Memento Mori offering), they have to be injured twice and then hooked and sacrificed for Entities entertainment. Survivors have various items granted by entity to help them survive the rampage of the killer. Both roles can be equally fun and challenging to play. There is a decent variety of maps and their versions in the rotation. After you play them over and over again, you learn the layout, locations and landmarks, making it easier it navigate. Game can be pretty spooky in the beginning, but after sometime you grow immune to it. Spook is of course regained with the release of new killers, but it fades away after sometime as well. Balance can get tricky, with every patch Meta shifting back and forth. There are bugs, I wish I could say there were less of them, I wish I could say there are no gamebreaking bugs, but they are there. Developers are usually pretty quick to hotfix and patch, and sometimes necessary fix might take a while.

[b][i][h1]Replay Value[/h1][/i][/b]
Oh there are TONS of replay value to be found in this game and only for $20! WHAT?! That's right, base game is only 20, DLCs are 7, cosmetic DLCs are 3, all are very affordable. I already got hundreds more hours from DBD than many AAA games 3 times more expensive than that. The sheer amount of progression and potential different set ups you can run, perks to unlock, characters to prestige, friends to make, hooks to break, Claudettes to murder, will just keep you coming back!

[b][i][h1]Final Opinion[/h1][/i][/b]
Learning curve is very high! Its Hugh Mungus, but it gets easier as you learn and get unlocks. With latest changes to Bloodweb, the grind is gone. If it gets lonely make friends, if you are lost and have questions come to reddit, we will help. Playerbase is high and solid, there are tons of fun to be had, and you are missing out on it if don't own it.

I reccomend this game but only if you are willing to deal with constant balance changes.  It's obvious they are going to continually add new survivors and killers which is going to change the balance of the game consistantly, and often requires a month+ for them to iron out the bugs introduced and smooth any overpowered changes that were made.  IF you can deal with this the game can be a great time sink, with rounds not lasting too long and failure usually being from your own mistakes.  Progression isn't too quick or grindy, and the introduction of the shrine allows that to be even somewhat quicker.

Future of the game will depend how haphazardly things are added, but as of this writing I am in support of this game.

Dead by Daylight è un videogioco a tema horror CO-OP dove quattro giocatori impersoneranno dei sopravvissuti che dovranno scappare da un altro giocatore, il quale vestirà invece nei panni di un mostro. Il concetto non è complicato; i survivors dovranno scappare dal mostro aprendo delle porte situate in specifici punti della mappa. Per poterle aprire sarà però necessario attivare dei generatori, per la precisione, cinque. Il killer dovrà uccidere i survivor catturandoli e appendendoli a degli uncini. Questi porteranno alla morte i sopravvissuti lentamente. Il lavoro di squadra è importante... i survivors sono in grado di salvarsi dai grossi ganci e di curarsi l'un l'altro. Se un sopravvissuto muore la sua partita finisce. Se tutti i sopravvissuti scappano, finisce la partita, stessa cosa se il killer riesce ad ucciderli tutti.
Vi sono 6 tipi di mostri diversi attualmente:

- Il Trapper, un grosso omone armato di una lama affilata e piena di denti. Indossa una maschera molto sinistra ed una salopette sporca di sangue. Ha l'abilità di poter piazzare delle tagliole per orsi in tutta la mappa ed intrappolare così i sopravvissuti malcapitati.

- Lo Spettro. Non è un fantasma, è un killer abbastanza alto ed indossa un mantello. Come arma utilizza un'ascia ricavata da una spina dorsale che termina con il cranio della vittima. Attaccato a quest'ultimo vi sono delle grosse lame taglienti. Ha l'abilità di poter diventare parzialmente invisibile se suona una campana dal rumore molto inquietante. Mentre si cammina nel mondo dei morti e siamo quindi parzialmente invisibili il battito cardiaco, utile ai survivors per capire se il killer si trova nei paraggi o no, non verrà udito e quindi sarà più complicato per i sopravvissuti individuare questo mostro. Non potremo inoltre sferrare attacchi, dovremo risuonare la campana e attendere circa 3 secondi per ritornare visibili.

- Il Mandriano. Questo bizzarro ma sinistro personaggio è gobbo e storto. Come arma utilizza un pesante martello ricoperto di chiodi che usa per infliggere atroci sofferenze ai sopravvissuti. Non possiede solo quest'arma però; una grossa motosega, (e qui cito le parole del gioco) capace di rendere frenetico chi la usa se mandata su di giri, ci accompagnerà nel massacro. Ha l'abilità di atterrare con un sol colpo un sopravvissuto e di aumentare notevolmente l'andatura del killer. Se si colpisce a vuoto con la motosega si ha uno stordimento di circa 1 secondo.

- L'infermiera. Questa tetra donna vestita da infermiera levita per la mappa, cammina sospesa per aria. Utilizza un grosso segaossa rinforzato da una mannaia. Infligge il dolore con quest'arma e altrettanta paura con i suoi strilli soffocati. Rieccheggieranno per tutta la mappa e seconda di dove si trova il killer. Anche la motosega del Mandriano rimboberà nella la zona. Oltre a ciò l'infermiera può anche usare, con la mano sinistra, l'anima strappata al direttore dell'ospedale psichiatrico di Krotus Pen. Utilizzandola sarà in grado di coprire lunghe distanze in poco tempo, viaggiando nell'aldilà. Una volta utilizzata l'abilità, però, il personaggio subirà un breve stun.

- Michael Myers. Quasi tutti lo conoscono. Si trova nel pacchetto di Halloween insieme alla mappa di Haddonfield ed al sopravvissuto Laurie Strode. La sua arma è ovviamente il coltello da cucina e la maschera e la stessa che tutti o quasi conosciamo. Ha tre stadi di abilità, spetterà a noi decidere quale utilizzare. Per usarli sarà necessario stalkerare i sopravvissuti fissandoli e tenendo premuto il tasto destro del mouse. Più lo faremo e più incrementemo il livello dell'abilità. Questa si divide in:
Malvagità Innata I - Battito del cuore azzerato, i survivors non sentono il killer che arriva. Abbastanza lento nei movimenti.
Malvagità Innata II - Battito presente. Velocità di movimento leggermente aumentata.
Malvagità Innata III - Battito presente. Velocità di movimento decisamente aumentata. Possiilità di atterrare con un sol colpo un sopravvissuto. Questo terzo stadio ha una scadenza e non può essere ricaricato infinitamente. Una volta raggiunta Malvagità Innata II non sarà possibile tornare allo stadio di Malvagità Innata I.

- The Hag. La Hag è una strega brutta e bassa con artigli spaventosi. Le sue urla farebbero rabbrividire anche i morti nelle tombe. Ha la possibilità di piazzare fino a dieci segni capaci di farla teletraportare esattamente dove sono stati piazzati. Si posizionano con il tasto destro del mouse, tenendolo premuto. La Hag traccia con le unghie un triangolo sul terreno che vale un segno. Se un sopravvissuto lo calpesta o ci passa vicino questo si attiverà creando una finta Hag urlante capace di spaventarci a dovere. Dopo circa cinque secondi questa sparisce. Attenzione però... non potremo sapere se si tratta della Hag falsa o della vera Hag... a meno che non ci strappi la carne dalla schiena con le sue unghie... il giocatore che usa la Hag può teletrasportarsi proprio sul segno che noi avremo calpestato o fatto attivare.

Vi è, in conclusione un vasto numero di perk applicabili ai personaggi. Dovremo solo sboccarli. Questi perk possono creare vantaggi o svantaggi contemporaneamente. 
E' anche possibile utilizzare degli oggetti per ottenere agevolazioni, oggetti consumabili ma anche cumulabili. E' consentito cambiare vestiti sia ai survivors che ai mostri.
I sopravvissuti hanno la possibilità di stunnare i mostri con vari metodi. Accecandoli con la torcia o tirandoli sui piedi dei pancali poggiati ad una parete. I mostri potranno e dovranno romperli per poter passare o limitarsi a fare un altro giro ,cambiando strada, per aggirare i pancali. Vi sono molti metodi per poter fuggire dalle grinfie di un mostro ma anche quest'ultimo ha altrettanti metodi per infliggere dolore e sofferenza ai survivors.

Il gioco è ben bilanciato, divertente e scorrevole. Punisce inoltre chi si disconnette dalle partite o chi gioca in modo antisportivo attribuendo pochi punti o, addirittura, togliendoli al giocatore che rovina le partite.
Il suono è un qualcosa di meraviglioso, molto ben fatto. Graficamente non c'è da lamentarsi. Il gameplay è molto bello.

Vi consiglio senza dubbio di acquistarlo, spendendo anche qualcosa in più per ottenere i DLC.
Gioco costantemente aggiornato con nuovi personaggi fra Killer, Survivors ed accessori.

Dal punto di vista horror è proprio un gioco ben fatto, non la solita cagata "jumpscare", mette un pò di ansia e questo è una nota positiva, puoi scegliere se essere il sopravvissuto o il killer, ci sono vari personaggi e ognuno di loro ha una propria abilità, il gameplay è piacevole, sali di livello aumenti di rank.. non male dai..  PERO'! eh eh però.... c'è una grossa pecca..
il MATCHMAKING, o c'è gente nuova che non sa nemmeno a cosa serva "ready", non reddano percindibacco! o il caricamento.. quest ultimo ci mette delle volte anche 15 minuti, se abbandona uno il tempo di caricamento viene prolungato e l'unico modo per uscire e chiudere il gioco dal task manager.. ho perso il conto di quante volte l'ho chiuso... ce... vabbè.... risolvete al più presto

Vorab: Ich habe dieses Spiel geliebt und werde es wohl noch weiter spielen, da ich Freunde hab, mit denen ich es spielen kann und das Spiel mit Freuden echt viel mehr Spaß macht als allein. Aktuell ist es zumindest für mich wegen des unten beschriebenen Problems nicht so spaßig zu spielen, und ich würde vorschlagen, dass alle die darüber nachdenken es sich zu kaufen noch ein bisschen warten, bis das Problem gefixt worden ist.

Leider sind mir allerdings gerade alle Daten verloren gegangen, knapp 160 Stunden, alle Survivor mindestens auf Level 17, eine sogar auf Level 37 oder so, die Killer alle auf Lvl 10. Mein Freund hatte diese Problem gerade vor 2 Tagen, könnte also sein, dass es seit den neusten Updates verstärkt auftritt. Wir haben eine Runde 'Töte deine Freunde' in der Lobby eines Kumpels gespielt und beide Male waren nach der Runde alle Punkte weg. Ich bekam noch eine Nachricht, ich solle mir die Tutorial ansehen und scherzte noch kurz, dass ich das nicht brauche. Dann wurde mir angezeigt, dass der Rang zurükgesetzt wurde und ich wunderte mich noch. Als ich dann ein neues Spiel starten wollte, traf es mich wie ein Schlag: Auch bei mir waren plötzlich alle Daten weg. Wir haben noch kurz nach Wegen gesucht, um sie iwie wiederherzustellen, aber keine Chance. Wenn ihr Spaß an dem Spiel habt, SPEICHERT eure Daten, nochmal seperat, denn aufgrund dieses Bugs, der bei mir inzwischen auch noch einmal beim 'Survive with friends' bzw beim Versuch des Betretens einer Killerlobby mit meinen Mitspielern (in die wir dann aber nciht kamen) aufgereten ist, werden die Daten in dem Steam Ordner gelöscht und das führt letztendlich dazu, dass sie auch aus der Steam Cloud verschwinden(so hab ich das zumindest verstanden^^).

Für genauere inhaltliche Rezensionen guckt euch andere an, manche haben das ja schon sehr gut beschrieben. Es kann echt Spaß machen, aber auch echt aufregen, besonders wegen der unendlich vielen Camper. Aber das ist echt beschissen so und gerade hab ich überhaupt kein Bock mehr das Spiel weiterzuspielen.

(ОБНОВЛЕНИЕ от 28.09.2019)

Вот когда тупое временное мыло откатят, тогда и отзыв будет положительным... (А вообще, может пора уже нормальные настройки графики ввести, не?) (П.С. Комп тянет ультры, но мыло - это кал)

(ОБНОВЛЕНИЕ от 25.11.2018 (старый отзыв неактуален))

1. Нерф выживших продолжается... Видимо, теперь идет ориентация только на игру в команде (ну и на ПРО геймеров) и одиночкам вроде меня выше 8-10 рангов делать нечего (чтобы не сгореть)... Ну окей, че. Жаль приходится каждый раз ждать месяц, чтобы снова ранг откатился (а набирается он "за секунды"), чтобы можно было поиграть на расслабоне, чисто в удовольствие.

2. От багов чет припекает последнее время... Сколько раз я уже видел сломанное лобби на 3? У меня аж лицо дергается, когда это происходит опять... и опять... и ОПЯТЬ...

3. Бесит, что все, даже важные вещи ЧСВ разрабы пишут где-то там, на каком-то там твиче... Как я, обычный игрок, должен понять что, например, теперь НЕЛЬЗЯ нажимать кнопку в игре "Покинуть матч" (или как там она называется), хотя такая кнопка есть? И почему за ливы из матча можно получить перманент (да даже "за плохой интернет" или за КРИВУЮ ОБНОВУ, например), а за мега-бесящий лив манов из лобби все еще ничего нет?

4. Баланс? Да это не возможно. Особенно с ЧСВ разрабами, которым ОДИН раз повезло угадать с чрезвычайно удачной ОДНОЙ концепцией (где там их Дес Гарден, например?) и теперь они считают себя "умнее всех" и думают, что что бы они не сделали - это по-умолчанию "Прети Джоб".

5. И лишь МЕДСЕСТРА радует и дает позитив в этой игре... Лишь на ней ощущаешь небывалую свободу "души и тела"... Лишь на ней можно расслабиться и играть по фану хоть на 15, хоть на 1 рангах... (Ну разве что, от лагов даже сестричка не спасает)

В этой игре не нужно много думать... Просто играйте за медсестру ВСЕГДА и все будет ХОРОШО.

Parto subito dicendo che il menù è buggato ma almeno ora puoi cercare 4 o 5 partite di seguito prima di riavviare il gioco.

Uno dei giochi horror più validi in questo periodo. Il comparto grafico è abbastanza decente anche se ci sono dei cali di fps assurdi (che non dipende dall hardware, ma dal gioco stesso), l'atmosfera delle mappe è azzeccatissima e molto suggestiva. Nulla da dire per quanto riguarda il comparto audio. Il gameplay può sembrare semplice ma richiede molta astuzia, infatti quando si scappa o si insegue si deve pensare molto attentamente alle proprie scelte e ai percorsi da prendere. Il gioco di squadra è alla base di tutto se si vuole vincere, mentre dalla parte del killer serve molta organizzazione e conoscenza delle mappe. Il gioco richiede molto timing sia da parte del sopravvisuto che dal killer. 

I server hanno un ping abbastanza alto (che il gioco tiene nascosto, ma lo si può subito notare dalla lobby iniziale), alcune volte può capitare di tornare indietro di qualche metro a causa di ciò, e spesso porta alla morte. Anche i test di abilità vengono castrati dal lag (spesso mi ritrovo a fare eccellente senza che la freccia sia arrivata al punto).

Il difetto più grande del gioco sono i player, persone che rifiutano totalmente di fare teamplay (spesso, gente che viene salvata 2 o più volte se ne fregherà altamente di voi, senza fare il minimo sforzo per aiutarvi), o i killer che si mettono a camperare davanti alla vittima dopo averla appesa ignorando totalmente gli altri giocatori.

Per quanto mi riguarda, questo gioco non è un Just 4 Fun. Try hard and have fun.

The game is fun. It really is - it does for me what Evolve failed to do in its glorious attempts. That said, the game has some really, really frustrating issues. I'm sure I'm repeating what other new players have said about this game, but I figured I'd raise these issues, which for me kill my spirit of playing the game.

Point A: Stop letting the murderer be the host. Host your own damn game servers. You ruin the entire game for 4 survivors (so 80% of the players in the game) when a single person with a shitty connection causes rubberbanding. It's horrible design, but I understand it must be very cost effective. Either way, stop it, please.

Point B: Stop letting us decide whether we want to be a murderer, or a survivor. I understand the choice, but it makes matchmaking in this game frustrating. Very frustrating. It takes too long, because you have to match 4 survivors against that one murderer - instead of just matching five players together and randoming who becomes the murderer. The issue becomes very apparent as many people like to play this game in groups of two or more - but neither of them can be the host (because the host is the murderer, remember?). This makes the matchmaking only work for solo-players who decide to play murderer. Bad, bad design.

The Hillbilly: This dude is too fast. Once he sees you, unless you have obstacles nearby, you're gone. Even with obstacles nearby, he can chainsaw through it. There's no coming back from him, and you can't outrun him. This makes him OP on several maps that aren't tight with obstacles. I'm not saying he's impossible to win against, I'm just saying I find him way more difficult than any other character in the game, period.

The Trapper/The Hag: The ability to place traps/popups very near hooks should go away. It makes rescuing anyone impossible, and is as such bad design. Make it a safezone for their traps/popups.

Starting games with three survivors: If a survivor disconnects during loading, the game will still start with 3 survivors (and one less generator to repair). This sucks, and even with one less generator you're still at a huge disadvantage. Only start full games.


I'm sure there's way more that I've yet to discover, but the main point is this: The game concept is fun, but it's poorly executed. I'll probably still play, and still get frustrated for a while more until I shelve the game. I can't say I recommend it though.

- Nurse screech
- Teammate disconnects immediately
- Found by Nurse and put on meathook
- Another teammate rescues me for the points with Nurse nearby
- Nurse hits and hooks me again
- Gets facecamped
- Teammates open exit doors and leave me
- Nurse hits me to show dominance before the Entity takes me
- Lost a pip
10/10

If you like being pissed off and wanting to break your keyboard in half, welcome to Dead by Daylight!

Here's how the game goes:

Failed to join lobby
Failed to join lobby
Failed to join lobby

Game freezes, joined lobby.

Have to CTL ALT DEL to end task on task manager to reboot game.

Repeat the above steps at least 2-3 times before you get into a match

Disconnected.

Failed to join lobby
Failed to join lobby
Failed to join lobby

Joined lobby.

You finally get into a match. Lag all over the map. 

You jump through a window to escape, oh killer hits you through the window anyways. 

Go to play as killer. 

Half the survivors leave. You dont get enough points to rank up, in fact you RANK DOWN.

GG Dead by Daylight.

You've officially made and continue to patch a shitty game.

DO NOT BUY

Il gioco è molto bello, il gameplay e molto interessante e ben studiato e con gli amici diventa uno dei più bei giochi in assoluto. Tuttavia c'è un problema che rovina tutto il sopracitato: i bug. Il gioco ne è strapieno e ho dovuto riavviare il gioco innumerevoli volte con menù che non funzionano e caricamenti infiniti, inoltre qualche modalità di gioco in più non sarebbe male. Отличная игра, прекрасно убивает время.

Замечательная игра. Которая прекрасно может скрасить ваш досуг. Однако, существует ряд проблем которые, по моему скромному мнению, заводят игру в тупик, медленно, но верно.

Подробнее о +/-
+Интересный сеттинг - сам формат который уже давно успели избить, в фильмах и прочих художественных произведениях, в игре обрел свежее дыхание и не выглядит вычурным.
+Затягивающий геймплей - простой и не разнообразный, но, все равно, затягивающий!
+Веселый и увлекательный кооператив - разнообразные тактики с друзьями, троллинг маньяка или наоборот, все можно реализовать с парочкой друзей.

-Нет разнообразия в классах, они формальны - когда вы только начинаете, да, классы (выжившие) имеют значения, каждый выделяется своей предрасположенностью в тех или иных вещах, помогая при грамотной командной игре привести вас к красивой и увлекательной победе, в дальнейшем, при получение перков которые способны изучить все, они теряют абсолютно всю индивидуальность. Спринт? Адреналин? Самолечение? Удар в спину? Все эти перки от разных выживших вы легко запихнете в одного.

-Полное отсутствие баланса - вытекает из первого минуса, из-за модели которую избрали разработчики, мы не просто потеряли индивидуальность и возможность складывать разные сильные стороны, разных выживших, чтобы придти к победе, но и получили чудовищные имба билды, на момент написания, для выживших, это Спринт+Адреналин+Удар в спину+Самолечение, для маньяков, соответственно, свои, у них так же есть имба билды. В итоге, командная игра превращается, на 90%, в соло забеги под спринтами и тд, и тп, без особой надобности коммуницировать со своей командой.

-Чудовищная неиграбельность некоторых классов маньяков - Вытекает из первых двух минусов, к сожалению, вся игра строится буквально на 2 классах, на момент написания отзыва Траппер и Деревенщина, реже, Майерс и Призрак, Медсестра попадается с частотой нахождения кейса с миллионом долларов на пороге своего дома.

-Количество разнообразных багов - в данный момент, правда, их стало гораздо меньше, но все еще очень много.

-Отсутствует система репортов - читы, я вашу мамку ласкал и прочие прелести "взрослого" комьюнити данной игры. На момент написания мнения системы репортов еще НЕ БЫЛО.

В итоге хочется сказать следующее, надеюсь, что разработчики реабилитируют 80% контента который, по выше описанным причинам, игроки не используют и в будущем мы будем видеть разнообразных маньяков, а не 1-2, и разнообразные билды с перками, а не как сейчас, 1 имба билд на выжившего, 1 имба билд на маньяка. Не успели собрать нужные перки? Страдайте от маньяка/выживших которые успели =D

I have a serious love hate relationship with this game. I am trying so hard to love it, but its such a balancing mess. If you try to play "honorably" within the community, the only way you will get anywhere is by playing the game ultra religiously, which, when you work 48+ hours a week like me, is impossible. Otherwise, you gotta get your hands dirty, ala camping, hook trapping, whateverelsethecommunitydeemsunsportsmanlike. I'm speaking from the point of someone who plays killer exclusively. As of this writing, I am rank 16 and sometimes it feels like some of these people I play against, who are rank 20 somehow with maxed out perks, just stomp me. It isnt fun then, when you are getting jacked around with by people with way more knowledge of the game. I guess what I'm trying to say is, the matchmaking is fucked. 

I enjoy this game( However I'm about as much of a masochist as the trapper killer) but would not recommend it to anyone in its current state. Sadly, It gets way too much Twitch attention to probably ever get any better than its current state. Whatever rolls in those bucks. at the moment, wouldnt recommend the game to my worst enemy.

Original Opinion No Longer Held (Mostly):

I've got over 550 hours in this game. So far every single patch they put out destroys the game bit by bit. And maybe they'll fix it and maybe it will be there forever. The devs will change things that have been standard in the game just to accommodate some new change they plan on making.  This game started really great! Was really fun and enjoyable. It felt fair and everyone had a good time. Now the game just feels like work. You'll spend most of your games holding left click hitting time events. The game lacks balance now. Every patch they screw something else up. It's almost as if the devs don't even play their own game. I'm done with this game. Don't buy it unless you want to put out a small fee every couple months to fund their $#!t show of a game.

3k hours update:

The game has gotten a lot better since then. Devs are listening more and pumping out more useful changes to the game that lets everyone have a good time. They still make silly decisions from time to time but are definitely more willing to listen to backlash and not just throw out whatever idea they had without consideration of their players. Crossplay with consoles was just released and so far it works like a dream, honestly the best patch they've released possibly since the inception of DBD. It's increased the queue time for those who choose to play without it but the crossplay itself works great. Newer killers have been balanced and they're slowly making rounds to the original killers to make sure they stay viable and balanced with new ones. I would definitely recommend this game to anyone and hope it continues to stay on the path it's on now.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀      [h1]Reseña de Dead by Daylight[/h1]
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

[list]
    [*]Gameplay
    [*]Gráficos
    [*]Servidores/ Matchmaking
[/list]
 Cada sección será valorada del 1 al 10 de calificación. [/b]

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀  [h1]Advertencia[/h1]
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ [b]
Todo lo que exponga en esta reseña solo es una opinión personal. Sé que puede diferir con las opiniones de otras personas, pero tratare de ser lo mas neutro posible.
Mi opinión estará basada en las mas de 7,000 horas jugadas durante 5 años. Siendo por épocas main survivor o main killer.
Sin más que decir, comencemos. [/b]

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ [h1]Introducción[/h1]
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀  
 [b]Dead by Daylight es un juego de horror de multijugador (4 contra 1) en el que un jugador representa el rol del asesino despiadado y los 4 restantes juegan como supervivientes que intentan escapar de el para evitar ser capturados y asesinados. Sabiendo esto, cómo es posible que un juego indie en 5 años haya pasado de juego con una popularidad pequeña, para convertirse en uno de los juegos más jugados en Steam, Xbox y Play Station, además de ser de los más vistos en Twitch. [/b]
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀      [h1]Gameplay[/h1]

 [b]Qué podemos decir de la jugabilidad. Yo lo considero el punto más fuerte que tiene, aparte de su comunidad. Antes del dbd, no había un juego de survival horror multijugador donde alguien debía matar, mientras los otros debían realizar tareas o confrontar al killer.

Desde su concepción parece simple, pero realmente te ofrece una gran cantidad de posibilidades y escenarios dentro de cada partida. Las posibilidades y los enfrentamientos que existen entre killers y survivors varía en cada partida, convirtiendo cada partida totalmente diferente a la anterior.

Las habilidades que te ofrece cada killer son única para cada uno, teniendo que organizar diferentes estrategias para poder cumplir tu objetivo. Además tendrás que emplear diferentes mecánicas para sacar provecho a tus habilidades de killer contra distintos survivors.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=crgMmyoDzNQ&ab_channel=Pyrus

Los survivors también cuentas con habilidades que tendrás que desarrollarlos para aprovecharlos de mejor manera, tienes la oportunidad de enfrentar a tu killer, abriendo un montón de escenarios y posibilidades para no ser sacrificado por el killer. Pero no estarás solo, tendrás que apoyar a tus otros 3 compañeros a realizar a las tareas, o evitar que sean sacrificados; y lo mejor de todo, lo puedes hacer con tus amigos.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cdwlQSoaeuI&ab_channel=WolfskiHD

Pero no todo es color de rosa, el juego cuenta con una gran cantidad de bugs que arruinan de vez en cuando la experiencia de juego. Los cuales son solucionados, pero siempre surgen nuevos bugs en cada actualización. Convirtiendo en un punto a mejorar por parte de los devs.


Valoración: 8.5/10 [/b]


⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀[h1]  Gráficos [/h1]

 [b]El juego desde su inicio usa el motor Unreal Engine 4. En sus inicio se notaba que era un estudio pequeño, ya que tenia una mala optimización (caídas de frames, malos gráficos, entre otras cosas mas). Pero con el paso de los años, el equipo de desarrollo creció, teniendo la posibilidad de mejorar en este aspecto. Dando como resultados, unos gráficos bastantes buenos en la actualidad.
Pero eso todavía no le exenta de tener bugs gráficos, y bastantes.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ME2AYJhOeDs&ab_channel=notMyieB

Valoración: 8/10 [/b]


⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀     [h1]Servidores/ Matchmaking [/h1]
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ 
 [b]Yo creo que son los puntos más flojo de todos, y eso que han mejorado con los años. Desde 2016 hasta 2019, el juego no contaba con servidores dedicados, teniendo como host al killer. Dependiendo totalmente de la velocidad de internet de él, eso podía llevar a malas experiencias.

Desde mediados de 2019, se introdujeron los servidores dedicados, pero desde ese momento, han dejado mucho que desear. La experiencia a veces suele ser mala con los servidores, desde hits falsos. Por "x" motivos que los devs han intentado solucionar, no pudiendo solucionar del todo. Quedando la sensación de que fallan muchos los servers.

Qué puedo decir del Matchmaking. Es un aspecto muy complicado en dbd, ya que no es un juego diseñado para ser competitivo, dificultando los criterios de emparejamiento. Se han impuestos distintos criterios de emparejamiento, desde los rangos, hasta qué tan frecuente escapas o matas.
Valoración: 6/10 [/b]

对于杀鸡这款游戏，我感觉很遗憾，题材足够好玩，游戏内容也十分紧张刺激，每次被屠夫追或者扮演屠夫追人的时候都会觉得十分刺激，但我仅仅玩了15个小时，不只是因为游戏中被屠夫直接追上弄死，也不是因为做人老是活不到门开，而是因为：这游戏里面用修改器改血点的人太多了，常常能在低段遇到高级技能的人类屠夫，且低段玩家实在太过于稀少，以至于有一次我等了一个多小时才勉强开了局，然而进了游戏又是被高端技能吊打，总之，对于新手玩家是十分的不友好，强烈的挫败感与等待的不耐烦让我最终放弃了这款游戏。

Frenetico, intenso, envolvente, pero sobretodo original e innovador.
Sin duda lo mejor, poder jugarlo online contra amigos o desconocidos, el toque competitivo siempre es un plus.
La dificultad lo hace aún más adictivo si cabe, como todo tiene cosas que mejorar pero lleva un muy buen camino.

好玩，就是BUG太多  有个时候游戏进都进不去。对于新手的我玩这个游戏简直就是给屠夫送温暖的，听见心跳就跑，然后瞎跑跑进屠夫怀里 屠夫都搞不清是什么回事 。 又刺激又好笑，  期待开发商完善服务器 修掉BUG。总之推荐！！

Улёт!

Начну с того что мне пришлось изменить обзор на эту Легендарную игру с положительного, на негативный, на это есть свои причины и вот они.
 А какого х""я я должен ждать так долго пока установятся обновления этой сраной игры. В добавок у вас не проходят проверки и установка и закачка этих обновлений начинается по новой. 
Перед тем как покупать и скачивать игру, подумайте хорошенько а хотите ли вы становиться Хатико. Потому что если вспонить фильм, милый пёса так и не дождался хозяина. 
Уже не говорю про баги игры они входят в игру бесплатным длс от разрабов.
